From Auckland via Kuala Lumpur to London Heathrow. Travel 21 January - 31 August 2026 Subject to availability, flight schedules & peak/flight surcharges. Note: Limited availability during high/peak season. Book By 23 November 2025 Travel agent professional service fees will be additional to the advertised prices. See your Helloworld Travel Professional for full terms and conditions. From Auckland fr $2,370* Enquire More Deals *Terms and Conditions London: Valid for sales until 23 November 2025 or until sold out. Travel departures 21 January - 31 August 2026 (unless otherwise specified). Subject to availability, flight schedules, peak/flight surcharges & closeout dates. Minimum stay of 6 days. Maximum stay of 6 months. Prices are based on Malaysia Airlines Basic Economy Class airfares ex Auckland on direct flights to Kuala Lumpur and on to London Heathrow. Some flight schedules may require additional nights at own expense. Change fees and cancellation fees apply once ticketed. SURCHARGES: Weekend surcharge of NZD20 will be added to the applicable fare for travel on Saturday for departure of first international sector. A surcharge of NZD10 will be added to the applicable fare provided outbound travel is between 20Mar26-12Apr26 and 26Jun26-30Jun26. A surcharge of NZD10 will be added to the applicable fare provided inbound travel is between 13Apr26-26Apr26. A surcharge of NZD100 will be added to the applicable fare provided outbound travel is on MH132/144 between 11Dec25-22Dec25 and 01Jan26-05Jan26. A surcharge of NZD100 will be added to the applicable fare provided inbound travel is on MH133/145 between 02Jan26-11Jan26. Note: Limited availability during high/peak season. See your Helloworld Travel Professional for full terms and conditions. Note: Travel is subject to government entry requirements at time of travel. *It is our policy to present the cost of our flights & holidays inclusive of all airport and government charges. Please accept however that these charges are not within our control, therefore we reserve the right to pass on any increase. Travel agent professional service fees will be additional to the advertised prices.
